content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to pi, of, the fraction with numerator, e to the x power, minus 1, and denominator, e to the x power, minus x, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="e to the pi power, minus pi, minus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of, open parenthesis, e to the pi power, minus pi, close parenthesis, minus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math>
<math alttext="pi minus the natural log of, pi" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the natural log of, open parenthesis, e to the pi power, minus pi, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="3.0ex" width="0.0em"></mspace></mrow></math>
